title: Poco a Poco Macrobiotic Cafe and Bar
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Japanese, Macrobiotic, Organic, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Macrobiotic lunch cafe and natural food shop. Reported small menu with vegetarian, vegan, as well non-veg food. Walking distance from Ishigaki island's famous Yu-gu-rena shopping arcade, near the Ishigaki ferry terminal. Could take a vegan lunch box to the beach or other small islands. Store hours are Mon-Sat 11am-11pm.
